Testimonials.title: What People Say
Testimonials.subtitle: Hear from developers who built with our stack
Testimonials.heading: Loved by developers
Testimonials.description: See what developers and companies are saying about LeoStack

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: LeoStack transformed our development workflow. We went from concept to production in record time. The built-in authentication and database integration saved us weeks of development.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: The TypeScript integration is flawless. We've reduced our bug rate by 60% since switching to LeoStack. The documentation is excellent and the community support is outstanding.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: As a non-technical founder, LeoStack made it possible for me to launch our MVP without hiring a full dev team first. The templates and components are production-ready and the deployment is seamless.

items.name: David Kim
items.content: We've tried many boilerplates, but LeoStack stands out with its modern architecture and attention to detail. The shadcn/ui integration and dark mode support are game-changers.

items.name: Lisa Thompson
items.content: Our team productivity increased by 40% after adopting LeoStack. The consistent code patterns and built-in best practices made onboarding new developers effortless.

items.name: Alex Rivera
items.content: The AI-powered features are incredible. Code generation and smart refactoring have cut our development time in half. LeoStack is the future of web development.

changePlan.question: Can I change my plan at any time?
changePlan.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

freeTrial.question: Is there a free trial?
freeTrial.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial for all paid plans. No credit card required to start.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers for Enterprise customers.

refunds.question: Do you offer refunds?
refunds.answer: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, we'll refund your payment.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about LeoStack. Can't find what you're looking for? Contact our support team.

q1.question: What is LeoStack and how does it work?
q1.answer: LeoStack is a comprehensive full-stack development platform built on Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. It provides everything you need to build production-ready web applications quickly and efficiently, including authentication, database integration, UI components, and deployment tools.

q2.question: Do I need to be an expert developer to use LeoStack?
q2.answer: While LeoStack is designed for developers of all skill levels, having basic knowledge of JavaScript/TypeScript and React will help you get the most out of it. We provide extensive documentation, tutorials, and community support to help you learn and build effectively.

q3.question: Can I use LeoStack for commercial projects?
q3.answer: Absolutely! LeoStack is perfect for commercial applications. Our Pro and Enterprise plans include all the features you need for production deployments, including custom domains, advanced security, and priority support.

q4.question: How does the database integration work?
q4.answer: LeoStack comes with built-in Prisma integration, supporting multiple database providers including PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite, and MongoDB. We handle migrations, schema management, and provide type-safe database queries out of the box.

q5.question: Is LeoStack secure for handling sensitive data?
q5.answer: Yes, security is a top priority. LeoStack includes enterprise-grade security features like encrypted data storage, secure authentication flows, GDPR compliance, and regular security audits. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

q6.question: Can I customize the UI components and styling?
q6.answer: Definitely! LeoStack uses Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui components that are fully customizable. You can modify colors, fonts, spacing, and component behavior to match your brand perfectly.

q7.question: What kind of support do you provide?
q7.answer: We offer multiple support channels: community forums, detailed documentation, video tutorials, and priority email support for Pro users. Enterprise customers get dedicated support with phone and video calls.

q8.question: Can I migrate my existing project to LeoStack?
q8.answer: Yes! LeoStack is designed to be flexible. You can gradually migrate existing projects or start fresh. We provide migration guides and tools to help you transition smoothly.

q9.question: Do you offer training or workshops?
q9.answer: Yes, we offer comprehensive training programs including live workshops, recorded courses, and personalized mentoring. Enterprise customers get custom training sessions tailored to their team's needs.

q10.question: What's your refund policy?
q10.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. If you're not completely satisfied with LeoStack, we'll refund your payment, no questions asked.
